Articles.Content: Floor 459: The entire room is one big, gray hallway; at the end of the hallway there's a control panel, and next to the control panel, a huge gear that has the number "101" on it.
Floor 460: Library that two stories high filled with fanfics ranging from Mlp fanfics to Fanfics of doctor who...better be rushing to the next floor before you read a terrible fanfic.
Floor 461 : The horror hapened! The two thing of the last floor mixed togetger, now you see Dr. Whooves on this floor.
Floor 462: Nuclear warhead testing site
Floor 463: A giant TV screen with cookie clicker.
Floor 464 : A room full of grandma

Floor 465: Neurotoxin production room

In case of implosion, look directly at implosion.

Hey guys? What happens on when we get to Floor 666?
Floor 466 : A guy saying, There's no 666 floor *dum dum duuuuuum *dramatic music
Floor 467: Very large piece of diamond.
Floor 468: People in suits and clown masks trying to access the floor below via thermite.
Floor 469 : Blocky people trying to acces the room two floors below
Floor 470: Nyan cat breeding grounds.
Floor 470:a room with filled with water.

(Here's a good one)

Floor 471: My high-school hockey locker room; 2 guys are talking about girls, 3 guys are talking about their teachers and classes, 3 more guys are talking about the NHL, 2 guys are talking smack to each other, 1 guy is stickhandling with a tennis ball, 2 guys are passing with a roll of tape, the goalie and another guy are arguing over scoring goals, and 2 guys are fistfighting.

Edited October 11, 2013 by TheHockeyPlayer
Floor 472 : Two guy arguying about the fact that an hockey player will never play ksp and virsversa
Floor 473: A sniper and a spotter looking out a window, aiming at a soccer field.

Floor 474 : Kerbals watching a soccer match on a TV, but you swear they we're watching other thing

...like ponies and magic...

Edited October 11, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

Floor 478: SCP-173, SCP-079, 682, and 76, disscussing, a plan for a breach. You quickly run away without them noticing, and alert a nearby Foundation Agent, before he gets mauled by all of them. RUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNNN!!!

Wait, they are able to communicate? I was knowing they we're sentien but...

Edited October 12, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

Floor 479:

You see a skydiver whizz through the open lift shaft.
Floor 480 : You see kerbal trying to picknic, but somebody switched the back-pack and they have the chute of the skydiver of the floor below
Floor 481: Uh-Oh. Room 101. Better get to the next floor fast.
Floor 482: There's a robbery going on; a man is trying to rob a convenience store!
Floor 483: You see a Kwik-E-Mart sign poking through the floor and see a robbery occurring through the hole it made.
Floor 484: The tongue-twisting thing of a floor...
